feed.title: blank
feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: i’m going to try to put some code here in Jupyter

link.title: i’m going to try to put some code here in Jupyter

entry.content:
To include a jupyter notebook in a post, you can use the following code:

{::nomarkdown}
{% assign jupyter_path = "assets/jupyter/jupytesting.ipynb" | relative_url %}
{% capture notebook_exists %}{% file_exists assets/jupyter/jupytesting.ipynb %}{% endcapture %}
{% if notebook_exists == "true" %}
    {% jupyter_notebook jupyter_path %}
{% else %}
    <p>Sorry, the notebook you are looking for does not exist.</p>
{% endif %}
{:/nomarkdown}
entry.summary: this is an attempt by me to use this website (dangerous)
